resources.string: Sign up and be part of the Laundrelly Family.\nStart to enjoy our benefits and worry less for\nyour laundry days!
Sign in with your associate number or your\nemail account and you are ready for more\nclean clothes!
Let us know if we can get to you.\nPlease insert your current address and\nspecify your zip code.
We have sent you a code via SMS to verify\nyour account. It can take up to 5 minutes.
